text: Anthony Adverse is a 1936 American romantic adventure drama movie directed by Mervyn LeRoy and was based on the 1933 novel of the same name by Hervey Allen. It stars Fredric March, Olivia de Havilland, Claude Rains, Rollo Lloyd, Edmund Gwenn, Anita Louise, Donald Woods and was distributed by Warner Bros.. It was nominated for 7 Oscars and won 4 Academy Awards in 1937. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1930s American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz Category:Movies directed by Mervyn LeRoy Category:Movies set in Italy Category:Movies set in Cuba
